title: Documentation for quarkus:info/update is not covering available parameters for the goals

labels.name: area/devtools
labels.description: Issues/PR related to maven, gradle, platform and cli tooling/plugins

body:
### Describe the bug

Documentation for quarkus:info/update is not covering available parameters for the goals

https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#project-info should also cover:
 - `perModule`

https://quarkus.io/guides/maven-tooling#project-update should also cover:
 - `perModule`
 - `recommendedState`

### Expected behavior

Documentation for quarkus:info/update covers available parameters for the goals

### Actual behavior

Documentation for quarkus:info/update is not covering available parameters for the goals

### How to Reproduce?
